channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1

item.title: Voice of America director says Trump officials are illegally ousting him
item.description: A judge is demanding answers about the international broadcaster's future from Trump official Kari Lake.

item.description: This is on top of Apple's previously announced plan to invest $500 billion into the U.S. over the next four years.

item.title: Trump to put additional 25% import taxes on India, bringing combined tariffs to 50%
item.description: Trump has signed an executive order to place an additional 25% tariff on India for its purchases of Russian oil.
